mainDescription: Claiming to be the largest casino in the UK, Aspers offers over 150 slot machines, classic live table games and the biggest poker room in the country. Also a perfect venue to watch all major sporting events across multiple large screen TVs.
secondaryDescription: At level 3 of Westfield Stratford City and less than 15 minutes away from Liverpool Street, the Aspers Casino is open 24/7 ready to welcome its guests and punters for a thrilling entertainment experience.

info.address: 312 The Loft Montfichet Road Olympic Park, London E20 1ET, United Kingdom

facilities.title: Food & Drink
content: Aspers’ Tanzibar menu is full of delicious snacks and buds for everyone as well as stylish fresh drinks for a night out.

facilities.title: Rooftop
content: Hidden away on the top floor of Westfield Stratford City, Terrace Bar is East London’s best kept secret. Its quirky modern design with illuminated bar and floor-to-ceiling drinks display make it the perfect place to relax or take in the party atmosphere.

facilities.title: Live Shows
content: Not a venue for live shows, but full of Poker events to join to.

facilities.title: Business Meetings
content: Facilities available for private parties and special occasions.

facilities.title: Aspers World
content: It is their Loyalty reward programme to earn Aspers World Points and enjoy exclusive benefits.

info.dressCode: Customers must be appropriately dressed to enter the Casino. A decision on whether someone is or is not appropriately dressed is at the sole discretion of management, but may include sportswear, football shirts and soiled or dirty clothing.
info.ageRestrictions: Guests must be 18 years or over to enter and they operate a Challenge 21 policy, so you may be asked to show a valid photo identification.
